articles.title: Petrol, diesel prices slashed: Check new rates here - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Fuel prices today: While the price of petrol in Mumbai was Rs 96.98 per litre, the price of diesel in the financial hub dropped to Rs 87.96 per litre.
